body:
Test output on (forced) error, with this change:
```python
(bumpfee-test-assertion-fixup)$ test/functional/wallet_bumpfee.py 
...
TestFramework (ERROR): Assertion failed
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/jon/projects/bitcoin/bitcoin/test/functional/test_framework/test_framework.py", line 112, in main
    self.run_test()
  File "test/functional/wallet_bumpfee.py", line 84, in run_test
    test_dust_to_fee(self, rbf_node, dest_address)
  File "test/functional/wallet_bumpfee.py", line 261, in test_dust_to_fee
    raise AssertionError("Invalid tx vsize of {} (140-141 expected), full tx: {}".format(fulltx["vsize"], fulltx))
AssertionError: Invalid tx vsize of 139 (140-141 expected), full tx: {'txid': ...
```
